title: Exquisite Emerald & Diamond Vanki Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Natural Emerald (Oval Cut). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and shine.
features: This contemporary Vanki Haaram features a unique layered design meticulously crafted with rows of shimmering diamonds. The central pendant showcases an elegant floral motif adorned with a vibrant oval-cut Emerald. Delicate gold ghungroo-style drops add a touch of traditional charm. The design offers a modern take on the classic Vanki style often seen as armlets but adapted elegantly into a necklace.
colors: Primarily gold with dazzling white diamonds and a striking green Emerald centerpiece. The combination is a symbol of prosperity and new beginnings.
occasions: and grand celebrations. This piece also seamlessly blends with modern evening wear for a touch of South Indian elegance.
description: This Vanki Haaram is a statement of refined taste, blending modern design with traditional South Indian aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and a vibrant Emerald ensures brilliance and timeless beauty. Its unique design sets it apart, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry making traditions.
